name: Vegan Burger
description: A delicious plant-based burger made with black beans, quinoa, and spices.

name: Vegan Pasta
description: Creamy cashew-based Alfredo sauce over gluten-free pasta, topped with fresh herbs.

name: Vegan Smoothie Bowl
description: A refreshing smoothie bowl made with frozen berries, banana, and almond milk.

name: Jackfruit BBQ Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked jackfruit tossed in a tangy BBQ sauce, served on a whole-grain bun.

name: Vegan Sushi Roll
description: Avocado, cucumber, and marinated tofu wrapped in seaweed and sushi rice.

name: Spicy Chickpea Wrap
description: A high-protein wrap filled with spicy roasted chickpeas, avocado, and fresh greens.

name: Vegan Mac & Cheese
description: Cashew-based creamy cheese sauce over gluten-free elbow pasta.

name: Tofu Stir-Fry
description: Saut√©ed tofu with bell peppers, broccoli, and sesame-ginger sauce over brown rice.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto made with arborio rice, wild mushrooms, and cashew cream.

name: Vegan Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine, chickpea croutons, and dairy-free Caesar dressing.

name: Vegan Pad Thai
description: Rice noodles tossed in a peanut sauce with tofu, bean sprouts, and crushed peanuts.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Quinoa, black beans, corn, and avocado stuffed into roasted bell peppers.

name: Vegan Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake made with almond flour and coconut sugar, topped with dairy-free ganache.

name: Chia Pudding
description: Chia seeds soaked in almond milk with vanilla and maple syrup, topped with fresh berries.

name: Coconut Yogurt Parfait
description: Layers of coconut yogurt, granola, and tropical fruits.

name: Turmeric Latte
description: A golden milk latte made with almond milk, turmeric, ginger, and cinnamon.

name: Matcha Green Tea Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with matcha, banana, almond milk, and a hint of vanilla.

name: Vegan Protein Bar
description: A homemade protein bar packed with oats, peanut butter, and plant-based protein.

name: Dairy-Free Ice Cream
description: Creamy cashew-based ice cream available in chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Whole-grain toast topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and hemp seeds.
